reviewText:
Vallee is an expert and innovator in MANY fields, including ufology (study of "the UFO phenomenon"), computers, the Internet.

From the description it SOUNDS LIKE this is a wide-ranging discussion of many of his fields. The FACT is that this is an EXTREMELY SUPERFICIAL overview by him of the [supposedly] "scientific" "remote viewing" program. He basically says that tests were performed at SRI trying to see if humans have some type of ability to perceive at a distance.

Although he doesn't use the specific term, what he basically says is he was taught the occultic technique of leaving one's physical body and it worked.
